sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ReadCRUD :characters = "chars"></ReadCRUD>
</template>

<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import ReadCRUD from '@/components/ReadCRUD.vue'
import {public_key,ts,hash} from '../marvel.js';
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  name: 'ReadView',
  data() {
        return {
            chars: [],
      
        };
    },
  components: {
    ReadCRUD
  },
    created:function(){
      if(this.chars && this.chars.length == 0){
        this.listCharacters();
      }   
  },
  methods: {
        listCharacters() {
            console.log("listCharacters");
                axios.get(`https://gateway.marvel.com/v1/public/characters?ts=${ts}&apikey=${public_key}&hash=${hash}`)
                .then((result) => {

                console.log(result);
                result.data.data.results.forEach(element => {
                    if (!element.description) {
                        element.description = "No description available.";
                   }
                    this.chars.push(element);
                });
               
            })
                .catch((error) => {
                console.log(error);
            });
        }
    },
}
</script>
